title: New said unit shall allocate at least 2% of the total proposed built-up area, for providing incubation facilities for new units
clause_text: New said unit shall allocate at least 2% of the total proposed built-up area, for providing incubation facilities for new units. This area would be treated as a part of the Park to be used for IT activities and eligible for additional FSI benefits accordingly.
section: 33(13) â€“ Buildings of Information Technology Establishments
